title: Niche or Splendor

en: You've always been aware your product is a bit niche. You're tailoring it most to the people who will find it useful, rather than going for broad appeal. That's what you want to make.
However, with a few tweaks to your product, you could probably open it up to more general appeal - and make it a safer bet for investors. What do you do?

yes_caption: Make what you want to make

en: You decide to make what you want to make. That's why you're doing this, isn't it?
It's better to make what makes money. Sure, it's not exactly what you wanted - but it's close enough.
